featured.text: Some see it as a celebration related to the turn of the seasons from winter to spring; others, however, believe that it 16 the adoption of a new calendar.
The Tuck family has discovered a spring whose water brings eternal life.
The world’s first ultra-accessible family fun park, Morgan’s Wonderland opened in the spring of 2010.
Ancient cultures celebrated New Year’s Day on or around April 1, which roughly coincides with the beginning of spring.
With pink cherry blossoms blooming everywhere, the valley ______ like a young bride under the bright spring sunshine.

definition.en_def: The season between winter and summer; a device that can be pressed or pulled but returns to its original shape.
